# PhotogrammetrySession.Output.automaticDownsampling

**Case**

The session reduced the image size because of memory constraints.

## Declaration

```swift
case automaticDownsampling
```

## Discussion

If [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/PhotogrammetrySession] encounters serious resource constraints during the object-creation process, it attempts to reduce memory usage by creating scaled-down copies of the sample images, and publishes this message.

## Monitoring data ingestion

- **PhotogrammetrySession.Output.invalidSample(id:reason:)**: A provided sample was invalid.
- **PhotogrammetrySession.Output.skippedSample(id:)**: The type of element used for Object Capture updates. The [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/PhotogrammetrySample] with the [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/PhotogrammetrySample/id] indicated was not able to be used for reconstruction.
